Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.outer

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.outer.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LobbyMessageReader
public class GameManager extends Object implements LobbyMessageReader
This class manages all client-server communication not directly regarding the game. Of the controller this is the outermost part, here is where all incoming messages of all types are managed. After reading the type, the message will be treated as needed. Login, Lobby, Error and Generic messages are treated by this class. Play and Expert messages are forwarded to PlayMessagesReader class to be treated as needed by executing them. Also disconnections and reconnections are managed here. A client reconnection will be done when a Login message comes with the same name of a disconnected player.

    • addVirtualView

      public void addVirtualView(String nickname, VirtualView virtualView)
      Adds a new virtual view to the known ones. Since client server communications work via the VirtualView class, on registering a new player a new entity of that is created and saved with the others.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player of which the virtual view
      virtualView - the newly created virtual view.

    • checkLoginNickname

      public boolean checkLoginNickname(String nickname, VirtualView view)
      On new Login request this method controls if the player chosen name is vaild or not.
      Parameters:
      nickname - name to check
      view - VirtualView to send errors
      Returns:
      true if it's valid, false if not.
